results.title: Yoram Gross interview collection
results.brief_description:
Contains:
1.’Channel 9 News’ item: Blinky Bill
2. ‘TVTV’ program (Sept. 1993): Yoram Gross, Blinky Bill, Guy Cross, Robyn Moore, Robert Smit
3. ‘7.30 Report’ ABC: Keith Scott, Yoram Gross, Blinky BIll, Dot and the whale, Guy Cross
4. Dot & Kangaroo, Athol Henry, Animators, Dot goes to Hollywood
5. Guy Cross Film music
6. ‘Channel 7 News’ and ‘A Current Affair’ (June 1994): Blinky Bill versus Senator McGaurin
7. Ray Martin interviews Yoram Gross, Dot and Keeto
8. ‘Small Business Show’ Channel 9: Yoram Gross interview, Sandra Gross interview
9. News article on the Childrens Film Festival
10. Childrens Film Festival interview with Yoram Gross
11. Channel 9 News: Childrens Film Festival, Bob Hawke, Guy Cross
12 ‘Today Show’ Channel 9: Interview with Yoram Gross, Around the World with Dot
13. ‘Today Show’ Channel 9 (May 1985): Interview with Yoram Gross, Epic (poor image quality)
14. ‘C’mon Kids’: making Dot & Keeto with Athol Henry
15. ‘11am’ Channel 7: Dot & Keeto, Around the World with Dot, Dot Goes to Hollywood, Sarah
16. ‘Tutti’ SBS: Blinky Bill, Sarah, Bandstand
17. ‘Midday with Derryn Hinch’: Robyn Moore interview

results.title: Blinky Bill production featurette
results.brief_description: Documentary capturing the production process behind the creation of a Blinky Bill animated film. Includes storyboard and cel animation, sound recording, filming live action footage, creating models, music composition and sound recording.Yoram Gross, John Palmer (writer), Frank Hammond (cinematographer), Ray Nowland (art director), Guy Gross (composer) and other crew are also featured discussing their work.

results.title: Blinky Bill
results.creator_credit: Yoram Gross and Yoram Gross Films
results.brief_description: Blinky Bill the Koala sets off to try and find his mother after their peaceful bush home is destroyed by loggers. He meets new friends and has many adventures along the way in this delightful animated film, based on Dorothy Wall’s classic story.
results.description: Blinky Bill the Koala sets off to try and find his mother after their peaceful bush home is destroyed by loggers. He meets new friends and has many adventures along the way in this delightful animated film, based on Dorothy Wall’s classic story.
description_for_label: Blinky Bill the Koala sets off to try and find his mother after their peaceful bush home is destroyed by loggers. He meets new friends and has many adventures along the way in this delightful animated film, based on Dorothy Wall’s classic story.

results.title: Bliss
results.creator_credit: Ray Lawrence, Anthony Buckley, New South Wales Film Corporation and Window III
results.brief_description: Bliss is the story of a man who so misunderstood the world that he almost got it right. The man is Harry Joy, he is happy, he has a successful business, a lovely wife and two loving children. When he dies, his life is ruined. He comes back to life and takes a good look at the world around him. His wife is sleeping with his partner, half of everything he eats causes cancer and an elephant sits on his car. No wonder Harry Joy believes that he has gone to hell. This film is based on the novel by Peter Carey. Cast includes Barry Otto, Lynette Curran, Helen Jones, Miles Buchanan and Gia Carides.

results.title: Blanche et Claire
results.creator_credit: Guy L. Cote, Paul Larose and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: Showing the relationship between two women of different ages who share their feelings and dreams, this film causes us to reflect on the right to dream in a world where dreams have no value.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Guy L. Cote, Paul Larose and National Film Board of Canada

results.title: Blades and brass
results.creator_credit: William Canning and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: The best of the 1967 National Hockey League season, set to music in the Tijuana Brass style and filmed with an eye to grace and style of movement suggestive of the bull ring as well as the hockey arena - a novel view, with soaring sound that gives even more drama to the struggle on the ice. Camera tricks enhance the unusual presentation of this fastest of winter sports. Awards: Cortina d’Ampezzo; Kranj.

results.title: Blackout: best kept secret: a profile of Archie Roach singer/songwriter
results.creator_credit: Llew Cleaver, Richard Reisz and ABC-TV (Australia)
results.brief_description: ‘Best kept secret: a profile of Archie Roach singer/songwriter is part of ABC’s ‘Blackout’ series and provides an intimate account of one of one of Australia’s most popular contemporary indigenous performers. The video examines how Archie’s stolen childhood has affected his life and his music.
results.title_for_label: Blackout: best kept secret: a profile of Archie Roach singer/songwriter
